title: Do you think Jarvan needs a VU?
body: I know other champs like {{champion:77}} {{champion:56}} {{champion:54}} need a VU more than Jarvan, but do you think he should be included on the list? I don't really like any of his animations. They don't feel smooth at all to me.

replies.body:
He should get an update somewhere between Ezreal and Warwick tier. A new model some VFX for some of his older skins and a slightly revamped kit.

He wouldn't need a lot of kit changes.
Riot said he was on the Ezreal tier list.
What erks me about Jarvan is he doesn't strike any pose when he ults. He just jumps into people like a stiff Lego man

He technically already got a lore VU. His new look has already been shown on the Universe site.
